Classes

Package Alaris.Irc.Ctcp

Classes

class  CtcpListener
 This class is used to send CTCP specific events. Once registered with this object the client can receive notification of all CTCP requests, pings, and replies. Instances of this class are not created directly but are retrieved as a property from a Connection object. More...
class  CtcpResponder
 A class which automatically responds to CTCP queries. The replies it sends are configurable by the client. More...
class  CtcpSender
 This class allows the client to send CTCP commands. There is no limit on what commands can actually be sent, however, the accepted CTCP commands are: UserInfo, Finger, Version, Source, ClientInfo, ErrMsg, and Time. More...
class  CtcpUtil
 Constants and utility methods to support CTCP. More...
